entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries near midnight. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
